entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023
